content:
Apologies for any confusion. Given your requirements, I've made some adjustments to the itinerary to ensure you arrive in Nice by April 10th and return to the UK by April 16th. This revised plan involves longer driving hours on certain days, as requested:

Day 1 (April 3): London to Harwich

* Distance: 90 miles / 145 km
* Driving time: 2 hours

Day 2 (April 4): Hook of Holland to Amsterdam

* Distance: 57 miles / 92 km
* Driving time: 1.5 hours

Day 3 (April 5): Amsterdam to Luxembourg City, Luxembourg

* Distance: 230 miles / 370 km
* Driving time: 4.5 hours

Day 4 (April 6): Luxembourg City to Lucerne, Switzerland

* Distance: 245 miles / 394 km
* Driving time: 4.5 hours

Day 5 (April 7): Lucerne to Lake Como, Italy

* Distance: 125 miles / 201 km
* Driving time: 3 hours

Day 6 (April 8): Lake Como to Nice, France

* Distance: 234 miles / 377 km
* Driving time: 4 hours

Day 7 (April 9): Explore Nice and the surrounding area

Day 8 (April 10): Enjoy time with friends in Nice

Day 9 (April 11): Nice to Lyon, France

* Distance: 292 miles / 470 km
* Driving time: 4.5 hours

Day 10 (April 12): Lyon to Reims, France

* Distance: 314 miles / 505 km
* Driving time: 5 hours

Day 11 (April 13): Reims to Calais, France

* Distance: 165 miles / 266 km
* Driving time: 2.5 hours

Day 12 (April 14): Calais to London (via Eurotunnel)

* Distance: 108 miles / 174 km
* Driving time: 2 hours (excluding Eurotunnel crossing time)

Total distance for the entire journey (outbound and return trips): 2,059 miles / 3,316 km

This revised itinerary allows you to arrive in Nice on April 10th, stay for two nights, and return to the UK by April 16th. Please note that driving times and distances are approximate and may vary depending on traffic and road conditions. Enjoy your road trip!
